From the brand

Giraffe Tools

Gear that works hard so you don’t have to

Giraffe Tools is the global leader in Hose & Hose Reel. Our products aim to truly benefit our consumer’s daily lives. Giraffe Tools insistence on automatic retraction technology in hose reel / pressure washer / cord reel industries has allowed the brand’s products to maintain its outstanding quality for more than decades.

Shop more garden hose

What makes our products unique?

Giraffe Tools has complete sets of modernized production facilities, much-specialized personnel and reputable designers.

Why do we love what we do?

Our team is constantly making a concerted effort to keep pushing forward in the pursuit of creating exceptional products that add value to everyday lives.

What problem are we solving?

Under our strict quality-monitoring framework, all products pass multiple inspection processes which provides consumers more safeguard.

Wide Applications: The water hose can be cut to whatever length you want. Long enough to clean roof, front and back yard, and short enough to be a lead-in hose.
NO KINK: The newest material is memoryless, the heavy duty hose will not kink, and easily coil and uncoil. The 3-layers design allows the hose to remain flexible under extreme temperatures.
Lightweight and Durable: Using the latest hybrid material from rubber and polymer, it is much lighter, more durable, and wear-resistant than the traditional rubber hose.
Special Design: The amazing part of this hose is that it can be re-used. If one part is broken, you can cut it off, and get the fittings re-connected. This one hose can be used throughout your whole lifetime. Great for garden, lawn, yard, car washing, and pets cleanings.
2-Year Limited Warranty: The Giraffe team has always been committed to improving the quality of life for everyone and enabling more families to enjoy the pleasures of the yard. All products are 2-year limited warranty for worry-free shopping.

Hybrid Garden Hose

  • All weather flexibility
  • Durable and wear resistant
  • 3/4in. brass plated fittings
  • Kink resistant
  • Lightweight
  • Easy to coil and uncoil
  • Leakproof with rubber washer

Customize Garden Hose Male to Female

Connector could be re-installed.

The hose can be cut to any length as you want.

If the hose may kink or leak, you could cut the defective part, and re-install the connector. Got a brand new hose.

Adapted the hybrid polymer material, makes the hose more lightweight, and flexible.

No kinks of the hose. Fulfill all your garden watering.

*6ft/15ft for leader hose

*25/50ft for watering plants and flowers

*75ft/100ft for cleaning roof and backyard

Read more

SOLID FITTING (Male & Female Ends)

  • Brass plating aluminum material, effectively prevent corrosion or wear, for a longer service life
  • 3/4″ large diameter connection for full and unobstructed water flow
  • Clear and standard threads, female end with washer to eliminate water leakage troubles

Read more

TESTED TOUGH

Its super strong flexible hybrid polymer material is abrasion-resistant. This hose has been tested rigorously to confirm burst strength and Durable. Giraffe hose owns longer life.
